Actions.Name: Steal Skill
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range, marking them. While marked, they treat all foes as having evasion and dodge. A character ends this mark if they hit with an attack.

Actions.Name: Lost Object
Actions.Description: The [name] produces and throws a lost object at a foe in range. Roll 1d6.

Rolls.Name: Kettle Full of Tea
Rolls.Description: Hot tea inflicts 5 damage and blinds the character.

Rolls.Name: Portable Hole
Rolls.Description: Create a pit under the foe.

Rolls.Name: Old Sandwich
Rolls.Description: Foe is dazed, then must save or lose all vigor.

Rolls.Name: Bag of Hammers
Rolls.Description: Foe must save or take 3 damage five times, or just once on a successful save.
